      • RunModemCommand

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> RunModemCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Run a given command on the modem serial device, will retry on no-response
        Parameters:
        command - String of command to run
        Returns:
        ArrayList of lines returned.

      • RunModemCommand

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> RunModemCommand(java.lang.String command,
                                                    boolean retry,
                                                    long timeout)
        Run a given command on the modem serial device
        Parameters:
        command - String of command to run
        retry - Retry command on no response
        timeout - When should given command timeout without complete response
        Returns:
        Arraylist of lines returned.

        private boolean testSerialDevice(java.lang.String path)
        This tests a serial device to see if it correctly responds to AT commands
        Parameters:
        path - Serial device to test for modem access
        Returns:
        Boolean for if modem is usable

      • findSerialDevice

        void findSerialDevice()
        Finds possible serial devices. This will set the lastReturnStatus and Path (upon success)
